menuName: Modular Scripting (1): Prosody segmentation from raw speech
menuDescription: A prosody tagger is scripted as a modular pipeline to demonstrate the functionality of feature annotation for scripting purposes. Speech files can be uploaded to get a segmentation into prosodic phrases and prominence prediction. Sample files are available.
name: Demo: Modular Scripting
description:
A prosody tagger implemented as a modular pipeline is used as an example of modular scripting using features. Users can upload their own speech files for segmentation in prosodic phrases and prominence detection or use sample files.
Prominence is outputted as peak points.
Users can furthermore select if they want to visualize all tiers generated from each module or only the final prediction (i.e., prosodic phrases and prominence).
